name: HopStepHotspring
description:
Overview:
Operation is very simple
This is an action game that uses the left and right movement keys and the jump button to advance.

There are 3 levels of jump, and each time you press the jump button, the behavior of the jump changes.
Use these three jumps to overcome various terrains.

Story:
The main character, Atsumi Minagawa, suddenly feels the urge to go to a hot spring during her day off from work.
If she was going to go anyway, she thought, ``I want to go to the best hot spring!''
Aiming for a legendary secret hot spring deep in the mountains...

Features
- Moderate difficulty level that allows you to aim for clearing even if you are not good at jumping games

・Three levels of jump that can be switched by pressing the jump button
1st jump: A very small jump


Second jump: Medium easy runrun jump


Third stage jump: A very high and energetic super jump
